1. to respond; to answer; to meet (e.g. demands, expectations) Only applies to 応える, Only applies to 報えるあなたは御両親の期待に応えるべきだ。You ought to live up to your parents' hopes.

2. to affect; to take a toll; to strike home; to have an effect on; to be hard on someone (e.g. heat, cold, work, illness, etc.); to be a strain See also 堪える, sometimes 堪えるそれは彼の身に応えだした。It is beginning to tell on him.
報える 【こたえる】、徹える 【こたえる】
1. to respond; to answer; to meet (e.g. demands, expectations) Only applies to 応える, Only applies to 報えるあなたは御両親の期待に応えるべきだ。You ought to live up to your parents' hopes.

2. to affect; to take a toll; to strike home; to have an effect on; to be hard on someone (e.g. heat, cold, work, illness, etc.); to be a strain See also 堪える, sometimes 堪えるそれは彼の身に応えだした。It is beginning to tell on him.
報える 【こたえる】、徹える 【こたえる】

sentences.translation: You ought to live up to your parents' hopes.
It is beginning to tell on him.

meanings.meaning: 1. correspondence (to); equivalence その日本語に対応する英語はない。That Japanese word has no equivalent in English.
2. suitability; coordination; matching; being appropriate (for) われわれは教育の方法を時代に対応しなければならない。We have to bring our teaching methods up to date.
3. dealing with; coping with; handling; response; reception; reaction 私は敵意をもったまでも、冷ややかな対応を受けた。I met with a cool, not to say hostile, reception.
4. compatibility (with technology, software, etc.); capability; support (for) Windows95対応のゲームを動かしたいのです。I want to run a Windows 95 game.

sentences.translation: That Japanese word has no equivalent in English.
We have to bring our teaching methods up to date.
I met with a cool, not to say hostile, reception.
I want to run a Windows 95 game.
